netPay = grossPay - totDeduct

hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name
column1304:
"^30")

# CS 1400 - L01
# Assignment 2 - Task 4

# Prompt for inputs
name = eval(input("Enter employee's name: "))
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name

hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name)

hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name)

name = eval(input("Enter employee's name: "))
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name)
column4639:
"^30")

msg += format("Federal Withholding" + str(ro))
# Display Results
print()

stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct

# Assignment 2 - Task 4

# Prompt for inputs
name = eval(input("Enter employee's name: "))
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name)

stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct

msg = format(str.upper(name)

# CS 1400 - L01
# Assignment 2 - Task 4

# Prompt for inputs
name = eval(input("Enter employee's name: "))
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name)
column8710:
">25")
msg += "\n"
msg += format(str)
# Display Results
print(msg)

name = eval(input("Enter employee's name: "))
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name)

# CS 1400 - L01
# Assignment 2 - Task 4

# Prompt for inputs
name = input("Enter employee's name: ")
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 
itemWidth = 30
numWidth = itemWidth + 10
totalWidth = numWidth + 5

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name) + "'s pay information"

name = input("Enter employee's name: ")
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 
itemWidth = 30
headerWidth = itemWidth - 5
numWidth = itemWidth + 10
totalWidth = numWidth + 5

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name) + "'s pay information"

numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 
itemWidth = 30
headerWidth = itemWidth - 5
numWidth = itemWidth + 10
totalWidth = numWidth + 5

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name) + "'s pay information"

hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 
itemWidth = 30
headerWidth = itemWidth - 5
numWidth = itemWidth + 10
totalWidth = numWidth + 5

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name) + "'s pay information"

"# @@@@ @@@@@@@@
# CS 1400 - L01
# Assignment 2 - Task 4

# Prompt for inputs
name = input("Enter employee's name: ")
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 
itemWidth = 30
headerWidth = itemWidth - 5
numWidth = itemWidth + 10
totalWidth = numWidth + 5

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper(name) + "'s pay information"
column17993:
">" + str(numWidth))

# Display Results
print(msg)

name = input("Enter employee's name: ")
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 
itemWidth = 30
headerWidth = itemWidth - 5
numWidth = itemWidth + 10
totalWidth = numWidth + 5

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper((name) + "'s pay information")
column21969:
">" + str(numWidth))

# Display Results
print(msg)

"# @@@@ @@@@@@@@
# CS 1400 - L01
# Assignment 2 - Task 4

# Prompt for inputs
name = input("Enter employee's name: ")
numHours = eval(input("Enter number of hours worked in a week: "))
hourlyPay = eval(input("Enter an hourly pay rate (ex. 12.75): "))
fedTax = eval(input("Enter a federal tax withholding rate (ex. 0.14): "))
stateTax = eval(input("Enter a state tax withholding rate (ex. 0.06): "))

# Calculate pay and deductions
grossPay = numHours * hourlyPay
fedDeduct = grossPay * fedTax
stateDeduct = grossPay * stateTax
totDeduct = fedDeduct + stateDeduct
netPay = grossPay - totDeduct 
itemWidth = 30
headerWidth = itemWidth - 5
numWidth = itemWidth + 10
totalWidth = numWidth + 5

# Format results
msg = format(str.upper((name) + "'s pay information")
column22469:
">" + str(numWidth))

# Display Results
print(msg)
